headline: Assurant Lending Solutions Unveils HOIVerify® Origination for On-Demand Insurance Verification
summary: ATLANTA, September 08, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes, and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced the launch of HOIVerify® Origination, an industry-defining, API-enabled solution that streamlines and automates insurance verification during the mortgage loan origination process.
